thread.section_title: Music - Malayalam - Entertainment - The Times of India
thread.title: Kerala introduces awards for independent music
thread.title_full: Kerala introduces awards for independent music - The Times of India

author: Anjana George
title: Kerala introduces awards for independent music
text:
By introducing awards independent musicians and their music, Kerala has become the first state in India to initiate such an award series. The distribution of these awards is likely to begin from the current financial year.
The awards was initiated by Manoj George, noted violinist and announced on Monday via a letter signed by the state's Minister of Culture K.C Joseph.
